Indoco has a strong international presence in the regulated and ROW (Rest of the World) markets. The Company has a well-built brand portfolio of a number of products in various therapeutic segments, including high growth life style segments such as Anti-Diabetics, Cardiovascular, Central Nervous System, Musculo-Skeletal, Nutrition and Dental care.
